actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1271.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill H.R. 12930 making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the United States Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain Independent Agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1979, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12930 (Executive and independent agencies funding).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill H.R. 12930 making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the United States Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain Independent Agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1979, and for other purposes.
